item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Software Engineer with a passion for Distributed Systems. My language of choice for most programming tasks I undertake is Go. In the past, I have worked on building systems for scale in the Travel, Advertising domains.

item.title: Product Readiness: Dev Ops
item.description: This is the talk I gave at a prelude for RootConf India, 2017 held at Directi, Mumbai. This is a modified version of the previous talk I gave on Production Readiness, with a focus towards Dev Ops.

item.title: Production Readiness: Extreme Engineering Meetup
item.description: I recently gave a talk at the Extreme Engineering Mumbai meetup group on Production Readiness. In this talk I covered a couple of points one must keep in mind for running microservices in Production.
